name: Deal Alliance Aviation Training
about: Deal Alliance Aviation Training is South Africa's longest established aviation training school, dedicated to providing high-quality theoretical training for private, commercial, and other aviation certifications. With a rich history and a commitment to excellence, we offer comprehensive programs tailored to meet the needs of aspiring and experienced pilots. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive the best possible education and training. We are proud to be a leading institution in aviation education, helping pilots achieve their career goals with dedication and professionalism. Choose Deal Alliance for your aviation training needs and embark on a successful flying career.
services:
["CPL Ground School
Aviation English LPR
CRM Course
GNSS and PBN Course
SEPT Course
RVSM Course"]
